title: Iran marks the 1979 U.S. Embassy takeover amid nationwide protests
description: The country's theocracy, which came to power 43 years ago, faces one of its stiffest challenges amid weeks of widespread protests after the death of a woman arrested by the country's morality police.
content:encoded:
The country's theocracy, which came to power 43 years ago, faces one of its stiffest challenges amid weeks of widespread protests after the death of a woman arrested by the country's morality police.

(Image credit: Vahid Salemi/AP)
